title: Xiao Po Hai
synopsis: Xiao Po Hai has strong Chinese characteristics, various styles, some humorous, but also a certain irony; some are warm and romantic, advocating warmth; some are childish, suitable for all ages. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Po Hai You Neihan
synopsis: The connotation of Xiaopohai is a new short series of light comedy animated short films in the Xiaopohai series; 　　The drama is based on the theme of "social life", the story is simple and interesting, combined with current hot spots, and expressed in the form of humorous paragraphs;(translated from douban)

title: Yunduan Di Rizi
synopsis: Xiaozhe is a sophomore student at a university in Sichuan. He is a kind-hearted and introverted boy. He is the object of the school’s older girls who want to fall in love with sisters and brothers. There is a weak and timid character in his personality, and he will be shy when facing the girls he likes. Since elementary school, I’ve always liked my childhood friend 99, but I’ve always been ashamed to confess. Later, after I failed to confess, I met Xiao Qian in a meeting with netizens. My feelings and personality have changed a lot. Views on love and life gradually improve their character.(translated from douban)

title: Ming Ji：2nd Life
synopsis: ep1:The story takes place in a small city in China in the 1990s, and the affection of an ordinary high school boy. In order to get the pictures of the girls he likes, he and his partners pretended to steal the pictures of the girls. Later, he secretly drew a portrait of a girl, and encountered twists and turns on the way to send it out, but met her downstairs at the girl's house. With the end of the college entrance examination, the story between them did not have a complete end, but the memories of that bitter secret love remained in the hearts of boys forever. (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired from 2008.In September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Special Award of China in the 2008 TBS Digicon 6 Animation Competition in Japan; in September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the Fifth Golden Dragon Awards in September 2008; "Ming Kee" in October 2008 Won the Best Chinese TV Film Award in the China Changzhou International Animation Competition; in October 2008, "Ming Ji" won the Bronze Award and Best Director Award in the Chinese College Student Original Animation Competition.

title: Ming Ji 2: Chu Zhi Lian
synopsis: This is a story about a first love couple who met each other in high school, passed the college entrance examination together, entered university and developed a long-distance relationship, and finally broke up because they couldn't match the distance. Beginning with the reminiscences of boys in college, I recalled every bit of him and girls in high school, holding hands, first kisses, riding bicycles, playing ball, and so on. The pictures are still vivid. It seems to confirm this sentence: "The road we walked together, the place we breathed together, the memory of a person and the trust of time, will still be reflected many years later, vividly."(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2010.In September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Special Award of China in the 2008 TBS Digicon 6 Animation Competition in Japan; in September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the Fifth Golden Dragon Awards in September 2008; "Ming Kee" in October 2008 Won the Best Chinese TV Film Award in the China Changzhou International Animation Competition; in October 2008, "Ming Ji" won the Bronze Award and Best Director Award in the Chinese College Student Original Animation Competition.

title: Ming Ji 3: Qushe
synopsis: This is a story of young boys and girls who choose between young and young emotions on campus. Cang is a girl who is obsessed with painting. Although she does not lack talent and technology, her paintings always lack some emotional elements. Ye is a boy in the same art examination class as her, and Cang sees his shortcomings in his paintings. In the process of coping with the art test, the two competed with each other, but they were attracted to each other unconsciously. Gradually, Cang had a feeling of love, and Ye became mature. After the cruel art exam, Cang is about to study abroad, and Ye is admitted to his favorite university. The budding feelings are a foregone conclusion... (translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2010.In September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Special Award of China in the 2008 TBS Digicon 6 Animation Competition in Japan; in September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the Fifth Golden Dragon Awards in September 2008; "Ming Kee" in October 2008 Won the Best Chinese TV Film Award in the China Changzhou International Animation Competition; in October 2008, "Ming Ji" won the Bronze Award and Best Director Award in the Chinese College Student Original Animation Competition.

title: Ming Ji 4: Chenfeng Zhuiyi
synopsis: Now I can still remember the faint smell of sunlight at that time. She said that she liked the calm melody of this song very much, just like spring rain, shining with the brilliance of life. At that time, I always liked to play the piano while watching the corners of her mouth curve into a beautiful arc with the bow. Maybe this is youth... I haven't seen you in 20 years, how are you? Shu Min...(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2014.In September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Special Award of China in the 2008 TBS Digicon 6 Animation Competition in Japan; in September 2008, "Ming Kee" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the Fifth Golden Dragon Awards in September 2008; "Ming Kee" in October 2008 Won the Best Chinese TV Film Award in the China Changzhou International Animation Competition; in October 2008, "Ming Ji" won the Bronze Award and Best Director Award in the Chinese College Student Original Animation Competition.

title: Chainsaw Man
synopsis: Denji has a simple dream—to live a happy and peaceful life, spending time with a girl he likes. This is a far cry from reality, however, as Denji is forced by the yakuza into killing devils in order to pay off his crushing debts. Using his pet devil Pochita as a weapon, he is ready to do anything for a bit of cash. Unfortunately, he has outlived his usefulness and is murdered by a devil in contract with the yakuza. However, in an unexpected turn of events, Pochita merges with Denji's dead body and grants him the powers of a chainsaw devil. Now able to transform parts of his body into chainsaws, a revived Denji uses his new abilities to quickly and brutally dispatch his enemies. Catching the eye of the official devil hunters who arrive at the scene, he is offered work at the Public Safety Bureau as one of them. Now with the means to face even the toughest of enemies, Denji will stop at nothing to achieve his simple teenage dreams.

title: Pokemon Sun & Moon : Ultra Legends
synopsis: Ash has completed three of his four grand trials in the Alola region, and more adventures await as he and his classmates acquire new Z-Crystals, make new Pokémon friends, and learn how to Mantine Surf! In their role as Ultra Guardians, the Pokémon School students take on an important mission to protect Wela Volcano. Ash meets a new rival, Hau, whose Dartrix offers Rowlet quite a challenge. Even Rotom Dex gets an adventure of its own when our heroes visit the set of its favorite TV show! And Professor Kukui's dream of starting a Pokémon League in Alola just might be getting closer to reality...
background:
The twenty-second season of the Pokémon animated series, and the concluding season of Pocket Monsters: Sun & Moon (ポケットモンスター サン&ムーン, Poketto Monsutā: San & Mūn) in Japan is titled Pokémon the Series: Sun & Moon – Ultra Legends internationally, and it originally aired in Japan from October 21, 2018 to November 3, 2019 on TV Tokyo. This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokémon school in the Alola region. The season premiered in the United States from March 23, 2019 to March 7, 2020 on Disney XD, as it was the last season to air on television in the country. Starting with season 23 (Journeys), the English dub moved to online streaming releases via Netflix in the United States.[1]

The Japanese opening song is "Your Adventure" (キミの冒険, Kimi no Bōken) by Taiiku Okazaki. The ending songs are "Notebook of the Heart" (心のノート, Kokoro no Nōto) by the Hino City Nanaomidori Elementary School Choir and "Type: Wild" (タイプ：ワイルド, Taipu: Wairudo) by Shoko Nakagawa.[2] The English opening song is "The Challenge of Life" performed by Dani Marcus and the Sad Truth. Its instrumental version serves as the ending theme.

details.English: Pokemon The Series Sun & Moon : Ultra Legends

title: Wo Shi Da Shenxian
synopsis: At the age of seven, the very short-lived child prodigy, who was growing too fast, returned to the immortal world to prevent his abnormal growing. From then on, with his gifted brain and wisdom he obtained from earth, he walked in path immortality to became the legendary god to return his normal life... (Source: MU)

title: Masamune Datenicle (2021)
synopsis: The movie version is 6-eps. compilation w. newly added scene.

title: Koroshi Ai
synopsis: The silent and stoic Chateau Dankworth is a bounty hunter. Her target: Son Ryang-ha, a notorious killer known for killing 18 high-class officials in a single night. To this day, his murders remain swift, efficient, and bloody. However, after Son Ryang-ha overpowers Chateau in their first encounter, he reveals his own intentions: he too is after her, aiming for her heart. Son Ryang-ha's attempts to catch her eye are quite unique, to say the least. He offers gifts to her in the form of her current targets, tied up and battered, and will do anything to spend more time together. Reluctantly, Chateau goes along with this act, and so begins the cat-and-mouse game of love between two killers.

title: Da, Da Ge Da Xigua
synopsis: When the two heads of the Black Plum Blossom Country and the Heart Country divided their territories, they belonged to a small island. They eventually broke their skin at the negotiation table, and the two sides launched a full-scale war on the three fronts of sea, land and air. In an air force battle, the pilots of the Black Plum Blossom Country met the pilots of the Heart Country. The two had a life-and-death contest at an altitude of 10,000 meters. The two aircraft fell to the ground during the fierce battle. The two were accidentally tied to the same parachute. Only then was able to escape. When the two found out that they were living on an uninhabited desert island, they could only put down their butcher knives and turn their fighting into jade silk. On the deserted island far away from gunpowder, they forgot about war and pain, and only lived in peace and freedom. But the war did not leave them. One day, the two witnessed a large-scale naval battle between the two countries on the nearby sea. The two had doubts about the meaning of the war. When the rescue team from the third country of spades came to the small island, The two chose...(translated from douban)
background:
October 2009 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Gold Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 2nd Xiamen Golden Dolphin Awards
November 2009 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Excellence Award of the AUTODESK Design Ceremony College Creative Competition
November 2009 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Sichuan TV Festival Golden Panda Award for Best Animated Short Film and Best Creative Nomination
In December 2009, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Best Technology Application Award of the Animation Academy of Beijing Film Academy
In December 2009, "Fight, Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Beijing Film Academy Animation Academy Award Love Painting Film Award
2009.01 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the Golden Classic Award of China (South China Sea) Animation Technology Forum
2010.01 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the "Excellent Work Award" in the 4th China Original Mobile Animation Game Competition
In April 2010, "Fight, Hit a Big Watermelon" won the CCGF (Professional Group) Best Animated Short Film Award
2010.04 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Nomination Award of "Best Animated Short Film Award" in the Golden Tudou Unit of 2010 Tudou Film Festival
2010.04 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the nomination for the "Gold Potato Award" in the Golden Potato Unit of the 2010 Tudou Film Festival
2010.04 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the nomination award of "Golden Seed General" in 2010 Tudou Film Festival.
In May 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the "Internet Popularity Award" and "Jingpeng Award Jury Chairman Wrap Award" in the first Shenzhen Jinpeng Award China International New Media Short Film Competition
July 2010 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the 6th China International Animation and Game Expo and 2010 Cartoon Story Best Animated Short Nomination Award
In August 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Best Animated Short Film Award at the 4th China (Yantai) International Animation Festival
In August 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the second place in the 12th Japan TBS DigiCon 6 Animation Short Film in China
In August 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the "2010 World Animation Billboard Top Ten Animation Works of the Year" and the director of the film, Mr. Yang Yu, won the "2010 World Animation Billboard Top Ten New Animation Works of the Year" award
In August 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the 7th China (Changzhou) International Animation Art Photo (CICDAF 2010) International Animation Competition "Golden Cartoon Award Special Honor in Animation Short Film Category"
September 2010 "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the "2010 Southern Multimedia Short Film Festival Silver Award for Animated Short Film"
In October 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the best dubbing award of "Excellent Animation Works Selection" at the 2010 Western China Animation Culture Festival
In November 2010, "Hit, Hit a Big Watermelon" won the gold medal of the 12th Japan TBS DigiCon 6 Finals
In November 2010, "Hit a Big Watermelon" won the Special Jury Prize of the 26th Berlin International Short Film Festival International Competition Unit
(translated from baidu baike)

title: Wo Jiao MT
synopsis: The animation is a popular fan network animation with Warcraft as the core, and its prototype is Blizzard’s famous online game "World of Warcraft." (translated from douban)

title: Wo Jiao MT season2
synopsis: "My name is MT" is a popular fan network animation with Warcraft as the core. Its prototype is Blizzard's famous online game "World of Warcraft". The film is jointly created by a group of game and animation fans. The characters include "Walnut", "Milk Tea Superman", "Lost", etc. The Qingxin humorous style is highly praised by Warcraft players. 　My name is MT. It is an original 3D network animation with Warcraft as the core, and it has been dubbed by many netizens as the "new light of domestic animation". When the planning began, Uncle Walnut started working day and night for this cartoon. Regarding Uncle Lost, in fact, Uncle “Lost” is super talented. From the creativity of "My name is MT", I know that "Lost" is a superman.(translated from douban)

title: Isekai Meikyuu de Harem wo
synopsis: Struggling with life and society, high school student Michio Kaga wanders about the Internet and lands on an odd website. The website, featuring a number of questions and a point based system, allows one to create skills and abilities for a character. Upon completing his character, Kaga was transported to a game-like fantasy world and reborn as a strong man who can claim idol-level girls. Thus begins the cheat and harem legend of a reborn man! (Source: MAL News)

(translated from douban)

title: Wo Jiao MT Zhi Shankou Shan Zhan Ji
synopsis: The tauren with the experience value of MT (milk tea dubbing) embraces the heroic dream of fighting a hundred-level dragon, but is constantly threatened by being caught "stewed potatoes". He and his junior friends Shaman (voiced by YOYO) and Bad Guy (voiced by CBI) accidentally obtained a treasure book called "The Battle of Yamaguchi Mountain", and the heavy task of saving the world fell on his shoulders. The dragon changed from a dream to a reality. Although stumbled, MT and his friends bravely embarked on the road of growth. (translated from douban)

title: Wo Jiao MT specials
synopsis: Specials of Wo Jiao MT.

title: Wo Jiao MT specials
synopsis: Specials of Wo Jiao MT.

title: Shankou Shan Zhan Ji Zhi Taiyang Jing
synopsis: Remember that hula doll? It caused a disaster, threw MT into the Cavern of Time, and took away his memory! The time guardian Syfiel discovered that this incident was related to a catastrophe that was about to befall Azeroth, so he rescued MT and made him assume the responsibility of saving the world. MT, who had recovered his memory, regretted all his bad deeds and decided to change his mind and become a real soldier. The prodigal son turned his head back and didn't change his gold. After working hard, he finally called back his former partner. But how would the alliance as an enemy view his transformation? What exactly is the catastrophe that Safir is talking about...(translated from douban)

title: Shankou Shan Zhan Ji Zhi Cao Qun Wawa
synopsis: Due to many times abandoning his teammates to escape, MT was despised by his friends, and no one wanted to take risks with him again. Frustrated, he got a magical prop-the hula doll, just shake it to go back in time and start from the beginning. MT relied on this treasure to return to know Shaman, and fantasizes to completely change his destiny. But his capriciousness caused a series of disturbances, and even aroused conflicts between the alliance and the tribe, leading to war! Seeing that once friends were in crisis again, MT finally realized his mistake. He once again shook the draft skirt doll, and this time not for escape, but for self-salvation...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 山口山战记之草裙娃娃

title: Li Xianji Lixian Ji
synopsis: Li Xianji is a patient suffering from lag. He has always been sitting in front of the computer and playing a game that he has not cleared. For this reason, Li Xianji did not hesitate to sell his kidneys. Under the guidance of an expert, Li Xianji learned that in order to clear the game, he would have to spend 500,000 yuan on a stimulant. For this reason, Li Xianji has experienced a journey full of legends, but because of lag, that The journey was miraculously shortened in his memory. Li Xianji desperately wanted to play this game because it was rumored that as long as he got through this game, he could go back in time. Li Xianji wanted to go back to the time when he broke up with Wang Qian. The effort paid off, Li Xianji finally cleared the game, but the result was not what he had originally imagined, but Li Xianji did not give up until he gradually aged...(translated from douban)
background: This anime won 2010 Tudou Film Festival Best Animation Award.

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie De Jin Yugang
synopsis: Miss Puff, a Gemini girl living in the corner of a prosperous metropolis, has a beautiful appearance and a slender figure. She longs for happy and romantic love, but her emotional world is empty like a fish tank at home. She thought maybe if there were fish in the fish tank, it would help her find a relationship. Xu Ye's unreasonable "superstition" really worked, Miss Puff met the handsome and gentle man. She didn't know more about the other party, but she slumped in the incurable lingering. Romance grows wildly, love is blooming, what is love? What is true love? After countless warmths, the fish tank is still empty. The moment you get it, it means to lose. Nothing can last forever... (translated from douban)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie
synopsis: Miss Puff, a stylish and sexy white-collar worker who lives alone. One day, she discovered an "Hourglass Dating" activity on the Internet. The rules of this activity are: Every participant has the opportunity to talk to all the opposite sexes participating in the activity, and the conversation time is the time of an hourglass. Miss Puff took part in the event, and all kinds of weird men met at the beginning. Later she met a man who felt good, who later confessed to her online. He said that all his comments on the Internet were true. Miss Puff decided to play a game with him, "Truth or Dare", the other party told the truth, Miss Puff played a big adventure, if the other party lied and lost, it would be forever Can't see Miss Puff again. The truth of true lies and lies, is it pretending to be happy or helpless?(translated from douban)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season2
synopsis: "Miss Puff" tells the emotional life of a single woman, Miss Puff, in the form of an independent short story in each episode. 　　 The protagonist Miss Puff is a fashionable white-collar worker with a beautiful face and a proud figure. Living in a prosperous metropolis, she has an enviable job and her own small circle of friends, but she always feels lonely. My friend Xiaoruo was busy preparing for the wedding, but she received a call from her boyfriend to go back to her hometown. In an accident, she ran into him, but things were not as expected. Then Xiao Ruo made a message on the phone announcing that his wedding was broken, and the love story in the city was always short and fragile. Can this group of urban single men and women find their love? (translated from douban)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season3: Wennuan Guilai
synopsis: "Miss Puff" tells the emotional life of fashionable men and women in the bustling city in the form of an independent and interrelated short story in each episode. Miss Puff is a fashionable and sexy white-collar worker living alone. She has her own small circle of little friends-pure girl Xiao Ruo, enchanting beautiful thirteen demon and trendy boy Super Mario. The four people have different attitudes towards life and different ideas about love. 　　 One day, Miss Puff met a French guy who loved photography. Whenever he goes to a city, he will take pictures of people's lives. When one person meets another, he will take pictures of another person with a story, one by one. He believes that human encounters are the most romantic scenery in the city. After meeting Miss Puff, he found that the lonely Miss Puff rarely had contact with others, and he felt that his French romance could not continue. Miss Puff said to him, didn’t she meet him... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 泡芙小姐第三季：温暖归来

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season4
synopsis: "Miss Puff" tells the emotional life of fashionable men and women in the bustling city in the form of an independent and interrelated short story in each episode. The protagonist is Miss Puff, and she uses writing to express her inner feelings, longing for a true love. She has three good girlfriends-the innocent girl Xiao Ruo, the fashion editor Super Mario, and the enchanting beauty Thirteen Demon. Four urban men and women formed the "Super Invincible Cauliflower Four in the Universe", each with its own worries and attitudes. 　　 Xiaozhi is Miss Puff’s male friend, and he has been living in Puff’s apartment for a while before he knows it. Two single men and women live together under the same roof. What kind of story will happen between them? On the other hand, can the grudge between Thirteen Demon and Miss Puff be eliminated? In this prosperous and empty city, everyone has all kinds of desires lurking in their hearts, friendship and love seem so fragile and short...(translated from douban)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie Hua Yang Ji
synopsis: Season5 of Miss Puff

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season5
synopsis: "Every thing contains a story, and we always lose a lot of things inadvertently in our lives. So in the fifth season, Miss Puff will be transformed into a "expert of finding objects", who will help people find lost objects and memories. Those who can’t find the North are looking for something. Each episode of the "Miss Puff" series is composed of an independent short story. The short film has an 11-minute episode and a total of 104 episodes, divided into 8 seasons. "Miss Puff Season 5" tells that everything contains a story, and we always lose a lot of things inadvertently in our lives. So in the fifth season, Miss Puff will be transformed into a "expert of finding objects", who will help people find lost objects and memories. We are looking for something if we can't find North... 　　Source: www.aiyoutv.com" (translated from douban)

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season6: Gan Ai Ji
synopsis: The animation uses what happened around Miss Puff to interpret the emotional code of the urban crowd and awaken every happy taste bud. (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 泡芙小姐第六季：感爱季

title: Pao Fu Xiaojie season7
synopsis: The seventh season of Miss Puff is composed of 12 separate short stories in two parts: the polar night and the day. The day chapter continues the past expression of love by Puff and returns to the track of love, whether it is reality or fantasy, love is always It exists in everyone's heart, and people shuttle between reality and fantasy through love. Love is a seven-second fantasy. Each episode of the "Miss Puff" series is composed of an independent short story. The short film has an 11-minute episode and a total of 104 episodes, divided into 8 seasons. For example, "Miss Puff's Hourglass", "Miss Puff's Key" and other borrowing themes are derived from real life storylines. They attract eyeballs and are full of profound meaning. The play introduces the production and broadcast mode of American TV series. , Production, broadcast, marketing and other links are carried out simultaneously, and the plot trend is adjusted in real time based on the feedback of netizens. The fully interactive program form has attracted much attention. The trailer was sought after by hundreds of thousands of netizens as soon as it was broadcast. There is such a disease, when you care too much about your lover, you will forget him. In fact, many people in this city are like puffs, looking for true love between possession and freedom. The protagonist of the film, Miss Puff, is an ordinary person who lives in a big city, lonely and normal like you and me. She likes to raise goldfish, she likes to walk alone, until one day, she meets the one who is destined to wait in her life...the subway, the station, the road, there are their lingering figures everywhere, and their hopeless tenderness everywhere . However, just like most short-lived love stories in this city, the fragility and twists between them are repeated one by one. It is shameful to be lonely. Is it really impossible to survive two goldfish in a goldfish tank? "Miss Puff's Goldfish Bowl", let us wait and see...(translated from douban)

title: Lianmeng De Yongshi
synopsis: It tells the story of the warrior’s adventure in the world of Azeroth, using World of Warcraft elements as the base. The plot content is compact, rich, wonderful and humorous, and the characters are prominent. It also reinterprets many of the elements of World of Warcraft. It can be regarded as a World of Warcraft. Look at the adventure animation with the world as the background. (translated from douban)

title: Xiao Pang Niu
synopsis: Once upon a time there was a beautiful castle, and there lived a...the handsome prince. He had an exploded head and was dry and thin. He really didn't look like a prince in children's words. But his appearance won the heart of the beautiful girl Cinderella (voiced by Zheng Shasha). But the good times didn't last long, and the prince was taken away by the obscene-looking demon king. Seeing that the beloved was in trouble, Cinderella dared to catch up without being timid. They hit the room from the blackboard. The devil was not only vicious, but also very cunning. He turned the daily necessities around him into weapons to throw at Cinderella, and even stopped Cinderella's footsteps by magically turning this beautiful girl into a fat girl with a big belly and inconvenience. However, in order to save the lover, no amount of hardship and danger can make the little fat girl retreat...(translated from douban)

title: La La La De Ma Xiya
synopsis: According to the story background of the online game "League of Legends", the script is based on various game cultures that players love to see in the game. With a humorous, relaxed and funny story style, it truly restores the fun and battle life of League of Legends players in the game. . (translated from baidu baike)

title: Baozou Kongbu Gushi season5
synopsis: What is the real horror? The flesh and blood of screaming and screaming? Do not. The heavy atmosphere of Qiye's strange talk? not necessarily. Runaway Comics made every effort to create a midnight scene, and "Runaway Horror Story" is coming! The new runaway horror makes you smile in a cold sweat! Tonight...who's turn? Friendly reminder: Please watch with the accompaniment of Guaishu! (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 暴走恐怖故事 第五季

title: Baozou Kongbu Gushi season6
synopsis: The Lingdu man with the soul-suppressing bell is wandering everywhere, sacrament, devouring, puppets... the strange talks point to the dusty history. When the most trusted person becomes an enemy, then turning left is hell, turning right is also hell, ancient Nima's path... where is it? The scary horror story of the runaway horror story, tells you the unheard horror story, so stay tuned every Wednesday (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 暴走恐怖故事 第六季

title: Baozou Lu A Lu
synopsis: "Bao Zou Lu A Lu" is an online anime produced by Bazao Manga. Based on the famous online game "League of Legends". It tells the story of an adventurer Ezreal from the magical technology city Piltwolf. He started his adventures in order to experience the legendary life. During the journey, he met various friends, various humorous and interesting things. Spoofing, popular, unscrupulous, many jokes, compact plot and intensive laughter, are loved by lol players.(translated from douban)

title: Baozou Lu A Lu season 2
synopsis: Runaway comics, the first domestic Tucao to LOL original animation "Runaway Luah Lu" in the second season of the hot return! Comparable to the exquisite style of Japanese comics, the consistent style of baoman has no discipline and no lower limit, and the plot is compact and intensive. The animation that once made us laugh out of our abs is back! The funny trio composed of Tsundere EZ and Rurouni Yasuo is about to embark on a new journey! From the second season of July 12th, one episode will be updated every week. The funny guys from Valoran are waiting for you here! (translated from douban)

title: Baozou Lu A Lu season 3

title: Shi Xiong Fanwai Pian
synopsis: special of shi xiong

title: Dao Buliao De Ta
synopsis: Ancient ruins... The tree of the world... The Frozen Throne... This is the world we are familiar with, this is the world in which we have fought countless days and nights... A group of guard heroes appeared here. They headed by Xiao Bingbing and took the elimination of natural disasters as their life goal, but did not realize that they were nothing but gold coins and experience in the eyes of natural disasters. As for the guards, Lu Chi Xiao Bingbing recruited an insanely intellect back pig, a messed up Karl, an old and wretched musket, a stone man with three sticks that couldn’t beat a fart, and he began to challenge the natural disasters. Up. But who on the other side has not been on the battlefield for more than ten years? Which one doesn't make people tremble just by throwing the name out? Xiao Bingbing had no idea what he was going to face, and the story began here...(translated from douban)

title: Dao Buliao De Ta-chongsheng Zhi Si
synopsis: At the beginning of the world, before the appearance of the guards and natural disasters, a river originating from the pure white sacred mountain began to nourish the continent. When the protracted war began, the heroes discovered that this river brought both a blessing and a curse. Its mysterious power allows the dead heroes to return to the battlefield from hell time and time again, fighting endless battles with their enemies. However, this is already history...(translated from baidu baike)

title: Li Shidai
synopsis: "Li Shidai" is a domestic animation that describes the daily life of young college students nowadays. It uses the hot competitive game "League of Legends" as the starting point to present all the stupidities and delusions that college students will encounter in the form of animation. Animation plot: Mao Zhiqiang and his partners are a group of carefree and unintelligible juniors. This group of young people, like you and me, talk about their desire for the future under the brilliant starry sky and seek heroes in a tired life dream. In the most beautiful student age, to have such a group of partners who can talk about each other and help each other grow up to accompany each other. That is the most precious gift that time can give us, and that is the most vivid life of youth!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Lu Shidai Xinnian Fanwai Pian
synopsis: Chinese new year special of Lu Shidai

details.Japanese: 撸时代 新年番外篇

title: Chao Shen Xueyuan
synopsis: Dinghei, the great inventor of the Shenhe galaxy, was the first to study the supernatural genetic engineering. He created the greatest God of Time. Dinghei and the God of Time brought the scientific concept of Super God Gene to all other civilizations in the universe and established Super Theological Academy. The prerequisite for Supershen Genetic Engineering is that the civilization has undergone nuclear baptism and has preliminary evolution and technological knowledge. The two most important technological concepts are: micro-wormhole delivery technology, and dark energy/matter decryption technology. Therefore, Super Theological Seminary has been established in the major known high-tech civilizations such as the Deno Galaxy Civilization and the Shenhe Civilization. But no matter how civilization develops, the closer it is to the top, the more it will encounter technological bottlenecks, which is the void world. A world that all existing scientific and technological theories cannot explain and understand can even subvert all modern and future sciences. But after civilization came into contact with the void world, it began to face the ultimate fear. In order to deal with the ultimate fear, Super Theological Academy plans to create three Gods of War to face the biggest challenge. Until 1,000 years ago, Ducao came to the earth and met Ryze. Ducao took on the important task of Super Seminary, gave young ordinary people Ryze incredible power and spread his genes in the world. These genes can eventually grow into a new generation of super soldiers who resist ultimate fear and even various foreign threats. But the earth was too backward at that time, Ducao and Ryze have been waiting and wandering. Until the time god's big clock was snatched by Karl.(translated from douban)

title: Chao Shen Xueyuan season2
synopsis: For a while, I (the author) was obsessed with the universe and time theory of the great physicist Hawking, unable to extricate myself. Later, I got this proposition "Super Seminary", and at the same time I played the game of League of Legends, so I expanded my endless imagination of the universe and the future. Perhaps "Super Seminary" did not follow any modern sci-fi and fantasy formats and routines, but did its own dream without any scruples, a dream similar to the Chinese dream of anime. Let us start with the defense of the earth and slowly Let’s explore people and the future. Super Theological Seminary mainly tells the sci-fi/fantasy stories of God and the future in 4 quarters. The first quarter focuses on how the earth’s people build and train a strong company that can withstand future threats. The second quarter The theme is placed on the aircraft carrier Juxia, starting a magnificent battle to defend the earth. In the third quarter, heroes will emerge around troubled times to tell the heroic story of every mature soldier company.(translated from douban)

title: Chao Shen Xueyuan season3
synopsis: In the third season, heroes emerge around troubled times to tell the heroic story of every mature soldier company (translated from douban)

title: Chao Shen Xueyuan Zhi Hei Jia
synopsis: The gods and demons came to the earth at the same time. They drove a huge spaceship and launched a fierce attack on the earth. Since then, the world has been changed in the flames of war. A male company wearing black armor will shoulder the responsibility of resisting invasion. They inherited the super genes of higher civilizations and grew up on the earth, protecting mankind and guarding world peace.

title: Xiongbing Lian Zhi Zhu Tian Jianglin
synopsis: The "Xiong Soldier Company" series is the first 3D war science fiction animation work in China. The "Xiong Soldier Company II Heavens Coming" is the latest sequel to the series. It describes the science fiction wars between various galaxy civilizations in the Shenhe universe. The story of an army composed of super genetic heirs, a company of heroes, fighting the enemy together when the earth faces an alien invasion. This series of animation presents an epic animation masterpiece for audience fans through a huge and complete world view.(translated from douban)

title: Xiongbing Lian Zhi Lie Yang Tiandao
synopsis: This work is the core link branched out from the "Xiong Soldier Company" series. In this big movie, Monkey King appears as a fighting and defeating Buddha. A superhero who lives in the confrontation between modern and alien civilizations, what kind of peak duel between Lieyang civilization and Direna? (translated from douban)

title: Si Ling Bianma
synopsis: "Necromancer" is a mobile online game that Ye Yinyi has always dreamed of completing, for which he has put too much effort... 　　 One morning, the phone rang. Ye Yinyi, who finished his personal work overnight, picked up the phone with difficulty. On the other end of the phone was his girlfriend Mu Mu, with a very angry tone. It turned out that Ye Yin was busy finishing the mobile online game called "Necromancer", and naturally ignored Mu Mu. Ye Yin was two hours late for a good date. 　　 Just after hanging up the phone, Ye Yin received a call from his friend Tie Ma again. Tie Ma said that someone was attacked by a monster near Ye Yin's family last night and asked him to watch TV news and pay attention to safety. As soon as Ye Yin turned on the TV, the news broadcast the weird incident of last night. The victim was a single woman who was bitten in many places and her left hand was bitten off. The victim's phone accidentally took a picture of the scene, and the monster in the screen was exactly the same as the monster in "Dead". The game actually happened in the real world! Who made "The Necromancer" a reality? 　　 The monsters that appear in reality are exactly the same as the monsters in "Necro", and the game gradually becomes reality...(translated from douban)

title: Juhua Xiao Dianzhi You Shen Me
synopsis: The heavens suddenly received news that a large number of people died inexplicably in the lower realm. After investigation, it turned out that a dark organization in the lower realm was constantly killing and collecting a strange energy from the undead. 　　 This kind of energy is injected into some ordinary people, making them more powerful, insignificant, and unscrupulous. Even the originally kind people have become extremely cruel. The organization attempts to use these people to control the lower realms to achieve the purpose of fighting the heavens. In order to disintegrate the evil forces and prevent the continuation of the disaster, the heavens immediately sent two gods to the lower realms to investigate the matter.(translated from douban)

title: Juhua Xiao Dianzhi You Shen Me season2
synopsis: The power of belief is declining, and a sudden power outage occurs in the East Realm. If it is not handled in time, it will threaten the stability of the Three Realms. At this time, a mysterious island with no faith appeared in the lower realm. President Yu sent a night tour to the lower realm to preach and collect the power of faith... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 菊花笑典之有神么 第二季

title: Mantou Riji
synopsis: This is the story of an orphan named "Mantou" looking for happiness. The innocent and kind "mantou", the superficially strong and optimistic but the lonely "mantou" in the heart, the "mantou" that has no parents and desires love more than other children, and the "mantou" that has no friends but a sincere friendship... … (translated from douban)

title: Xingfu Xiao Zhen
synopsis: (Children's version) 　　 Tornado Island is a special island where spring, summer, autumn and winter exist at the same time. The Cyclone Village on Spring Island is a quiet and peaceful village. Suddenly, the village head of Cyclone Village received an invitation to go to Summer Island to participate in the Cyclone Island Village Leaders’ Meeting. The village chief returned to attend, and on the way he was kidnapped by a group of guys claiming to be the border king's guard. The protagonist of the story, Kami and his friends, happened to be in this kidnapping incident. Kami and the others bravely protected the village chief, but because their combat effectiveness was too weak, they could only watch the village chief being taken away. Ke Mi and her friends are determined to rescue the village chief and start the arduous practice... 　　 (adult version) 　　 Tornado Island is the home of Komi and his friends, who live peacefully and happily on that island. But this is a passionate animation, so it is impossible not to have a tragedy-the village chief was taken away! The village chief! The village chief who owes money to the whole village! After being taken away, whoever wants the money! ! ! So we are desperate to take the village head back! For the mortgage! To increase prices! For children to go to a good school! We, we must fight the border king to the end! Even if you can't beat it, even if you've been beaten countless times! We all stand up again! Because we don’t have the money to travel back to Chundao by car! 　　 fight! juvenile!(translated from douban)

title: Xingfu Xiao Zhen season2
synopsis: Countless years ago, a beam of light fell on an unknown planet and formed a circular island. The four seasons coexist on the strange island, and thus form the four forces of spring, summer, autumn and winter. Everything seems peaceful and peaceful, but in the race for balance and restriction, the gears of fate have quietly turned, and all creatures on the island will be involved in this torrent.(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 2013.There is only one episode in this season.

title: Nanocore special
synopsis: Specials of nanocore.

title: Zhongguo Jingqi Xiansheng(movie)
synopsis: It is recap movie.The movie "Mr. Marvel in China" is adapted from the young manga of the same name created by Quan Yingsheng. It tells the story of the "Triangle of Exorcism" formed by the heirs of Taoism, Wang Xiaoer, the police flower, and the old police, to detect various supernatural cases. In an alley in Beijing, women off work are often raped and broken by perverts. After several investigations, the policeman Niu concluded that this series of cases were not committed by humans. Under the circumstances, Wang Xiaoer met Li Xue, a female police officer, and Wang Xiaoer, a Taoist priest, started to help the police detect various supernatural cases in order to pursue the police officer. A series of incredible incidents began.(translated from douban)

title: Shaolin Tu Yu Wudang Gou
synopsis: On a quiet day, the painter was listening to music while creating. He just hung up the phone and turned to the job at hand. In just two strokes, a thin but very clever rabbit is on the paper. The funny painter drew an apple above the rabbit's head. The apple hit the rabbit's head, while the painter gloated. The Kung Fu Rabbit with stunts didn't want to suffer any more. He quickly dodged the painter's rough red line, dived into the water, and overpowered the menacing fish in threes and then jumped out of the water cup. Of course, the painter would never allow such a disobedient cartoon character in his pen, and he drew a vicious dog. The dog barked and rushed towards the Kung Fu Rabbit. 　　 Rabbit is small, but he never surrenders easily. He ran all the way, passing various obstacles, not only defeated the dog, but also ushered in the moment of duel with the painter...(translated from douban)

title: Tuzi Nali Pao
synopsis: The naughty rabbit and puppy urinated on the head of the animator Li Zhiyong, only to get caught. The painter decided to punish these two guys. The puppy was helplessly beaten, but how could the lively little rabbit easily give in? It and the painter had a wonderful and exciting offensive and defensive battle in the Fangcundou room. Who is going to die in the end?(translated from douban)

title: Cai Bao Gou Da Fanji
synopsis: At the beginning of the picture, one hand placed the stylus on the record with dogs and Kung Fu rabbits. With the classic melody of "Two Tigers", a new battle is about to begin. This time, the painter set a carrot trap on the desk. As long as the Kung Fu Rabbit greedily walks towards the carrot, he will definitely be caught under the bowl. The painter is determined to win, holding a telescope and staring at the trap from a distance, waiting for an exciting moment. Surprisingly, the unlucky Caibao dog fell into the trap, while the artist was rectified by the sudden appearance of Kung Fu Rabbit. The painter became angry and ordered the dog to attack the Kung Fu Rabbit, but Cai Baoguo, who had been defeated repeatedly, failed again without any suspense. 　　 The defeated dog that came back with its tail clipped was mercilessly humiliated by the painter. For the sake of shame, Cai Baogu was thrown into hell-like special training...(translated from douban)

title: Rail Romanesque 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Rail Romanesque.

title: Nihon Chinbotsu 2020 Gekijou Henshuuban Shizumanu Kibou
synopsis: The Mutou family leads a peaceful life: Kouichirou works at a construction site and his wife Mari is returning from an overseas trip. Their daughter Ayumu has just finished her track practice while their son Gou is playing video games at home. However, life as they know it is flipped upside down when a calamitous earthquake strikes the entire Japanese archipelago—obliterating the face of the country in an instant. With society crumbling around them and their nation gradually sinking into the ocean, the Mutou family must band together to survive the catastrophe. Treading the near-apocalyptic setting, they struggle not only to stay alive, but also to learn the difficulty of coping with loss.
background: Nihon Chinbotsu 2020 Gekijou Henshuuban Shizumanu Kibou is an edited theatrical version of the original netflix animated series and one of many works based on Sakyo Komatsu's award-winning 1973 disaster novel of the same name..

details.English: Japan Sinks 2020 Theatrical Edition Unsinkable Hope
details.Synonyms: Japan Sinks 2020 Theatrical Edition Unsinkable Hope
details.Japanese: 日本沈没2020 劇場編集版　シズマヌキボウ

title: Kakushigoto Movie
synopsis: Compilation movie of the TV series which includes new scenes that were not adapted in the television anime, and different perspectives. Kakushi Gotou is a somewhat popular manga artist whose works are known for inappropriate content. Because of this raunchiness, when his daughter Hime was born, he vowed to keep his profession hidden from her, believing that she will be disillusioned if she finds out. This paranoia-induced belief leads Kakushi into hectic situations. Despite being a single father, he does his best and often resorts to extreme ends just to protect his secret, such as guising as a salaryman every day or holding emergency drills in case Hime somehow finds her way to his workplace. Kakushigoto tells the story of a father and daughter living side by side, maintaining their peaceful existence as the father attempts to preserve the status quo. However, there is a saying: "there are no secrets that time cannot reveal." In time, Hime must learn the reality behind the things she took for granted as she grew up.

details.Japanese: 劇場編集版 かくしごと

title: Nemurenai Yoru no Tsuki
synopsis: A squirrel and a boy set out on a journey together to restore daylight. They must find and release the moon stuck high up on a tree somewhere far, far away. (Source: JFF Plus)

title: The Gregory Gallery Tour Special
synopsis: Three unbroadcasted exclusive Special shorts, "The Gregory Gallery Tour" (presented as bonus videos on the first series DVDs volumes 1-3 in Japan only), containing stories featuring Gregory himself as a guide, giving his commentary and thoughts on each of the guests in the hotel, also displaying paintings based around the said guests.

synopsis: Collaboration anime between Kami-tachi ni Hirowareta Otoko and Tensei shitara Slime Datta Ken.

details.Japanese: スライムたちの井戸端会議にリムルが登場！

title: Shua Bing Nan De Gaoxiao Juchang
synopsis: The hilarious day and the wind short play "Slashing Soldier's Funny Theater" is adapted from the popular comic of the same name. As the protagonist of the play, "Shuabing Man" has a two-dimensional thinking and a "creature" that exists like a god. It is definitely the cock among the diaosi. The terminator of Marisu makes people feel tight. The grooves and humor that it inadvertently produces in daily life makes you laugh, and then you want to point to the nose of the "shua soldier man" and curse "SB man". Coupled with the dubbing and painting style of the Japanese style, it can be called the most funny and cheating online skit in the history of surpassing "A Hundred Thousand Chill Jokes" and "Unexpectedly".(translated from douban)

title: Xiongmao Shou Zha
synopsis: A panda that has passed Level 2 in Mandarin, Level 4 in English, and Level 2 in computer, has been mixed into human society after untold hardships, and even admitted to university. In its simplicity, I think I am the world. The weirdest college student in the world, who knows, look around: 　　Boss? What are these leaves representing the vicissitudes of life? What? Are you the former boss of Southeast Asian gangs? 　　Squad leader? Why are there all AK-47s in the closet? Shrimp? You were a core member of a terrorist organization in the Middle East? 　　 Second child? Does it make sense to hang this dog from a tree? what? Out of instinct? 　　The youngest? Can the bodyguard's gun be retrieved first? Just playing ping pong with you... 　　 wait a minute! Heiwa! You won’t be a national treasure if you eat me! 　　 Penguin is about to tell a joke, old B is about to draw his sword? by! How did you cut down the plateau people, is your sword really the backbone of the Northwest Gang? 　　 Teacher! There is a plane crashing over there! Are you not going? Do you want to supervise this dog to finish peeing in the toilet? Are you a superman or a sanitation worker? ?(translated from douban)

title: Shijiu Guo
synopsis: "Shijiu Guo" is a small-cost, funny and inspirational animation recently launched by iQiyi. The animation is based on 19 countries that are about to end the world, and tells multiple intricate stories with different main lines. The world will perish in 100 days. The nineteen countries on the spiral continent showed different beliefs when facing the burning of the doomsday. These firm beliefs brought peace of mind to the citizens of each country before the doomsday, and people in the beautiful Greet the destruction and defeat the fear of the end with faith.(translated from douban)

title: Hua Jianghu Zhi Gui Yexing
synopsis: This is a story about growth, friendship and passion. Through the continuous improvement of racing skills, the in-depth understanding of the concept of racing, and the understanding of the meaning of life and the friendship of friends, the originally ambitious racing boy Higashino Ji has gradually grown into the most reliable partner and the most reliable neighborhood. , And gradually grow into the most powerful racer...(translated from douban)

title: Hua Jianghu Zhi Xia Lan Wuqi Lu
synopsis: specials of Hua Jianghu Zhi Xia Lan
